        is the function responsible for retrieving non~-cached data~, <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|timer>>
        ~(if any~) is the life span of cached values ~(in seconds~) ~(values in the
        cache are removed after their time is up~) and <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|size>> is the upper
        bound to the number of simultaneoulsy cached elements~.


        ~Whenever a value is found ~(using <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|find>> method~)~, it~'s lifespan is set
        to <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|timer>> ~(or not if the cache is not time bounded~)~. ~If the value was
        already cached~, it~'s lifespan is reset to <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|timer>>~.


        ~Using <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|timer>> allow one to create a cache
        bounded both in space and time~. ~It is to be noted that real lifespan
        of values is always slightly greater than <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|timer>>~.
